00011 // imagemap.cpp*
00012 #include "pbrt.h"
00013 #include "texture.h"
00014 #include "mipmap.h"
00015 #include "paramset.h"
00016 #include <map>
00017 using std::map;
00018 // ImageMapTexture Declarations
00019 template <class T>
00020 class ImageTexture : public Texture<T> {
00021 public:
00022         // ImageTexture Public Methods
00023         ImageTexture(TextureMapping2D *m,
00024                      const string &filename,
00025                                  bool doTri,
00026                                  float maxAniso,
00027                                  ImageWrap wm);
00028         T Evaluate(const DifferentialGeometry &) const;
00029         ~ImageTexture();
00030 private:
00031         // ImageTexture Private Methods
00032         static MIPMap<T> *GetTexture(const string &filename,
00033             bool doTrilinear, float maxAniso, ImageWrap wm);
00034         static void convert(const Spectrum &from, Spectrum *to) {
00035                 *to = from;
00036         }
00037         static void convert(const Spectrum &from, float *to) {
00038                 *to = from.y();
00039         }
00040         // ImageTexture Private Data
00041         MIPMap<T> *mipmap;
00042         TextureMapping2D *mapping;
00043 };
00044 // ImageMapTexture Method Definitions
00045 template <class T>
00046 ImageTexture<T>::ImageTexture(TextureMapping2D *m,
00047                 const string &filename,
00048                 bool doTrilinear,
00049                 float maxAniso,
00050                 ImageWrap wrapMode) {
00051         mapping = m;
00052         mipmap = GetTexture(filename, doTrilinear,
00053                 maxAniso, wrapMode);
00054 }
00055 template <class T> ImageTexture<T>::~ImageTexture() {
00056         delete mapping;
00057 }
00058 struct TexInfo {
00059         TexInfo(const string &f, bool dt, float ma, ImageWrap wm)
00060                 : filename(f), doTrilinear(dt), maxAniso(ma), wrapMode(wm) { }
00061         string filename;
00062         bool doTrilinear;
00063         float maxAniso;
00064         ImageWrap wrapMode;
00065         bool operator<(const TexInfo &t2) const {
00066                 if (filename != t2.filename) return filename < t2.filename;
00067                 if (doTrilinear != t2.doTrilinear) return doTrilinear < t2.doTrilinear;
00068                 if (maxAniso != t2.maxAniso) return maxAniso < t2.maxAniso;
00069                 return wrapMode < t2.wrapMode;
00070         }
00071 };
00072 template <class T> MIPMap<T> *ImageTexture<T>::
00073 	GetTexture( const string &filename,
00074                    bool doTrilinear,
00075                            float maxAniso,
00076                            ImageWrap wrap) {
00077         // Look for texture in texture cache
00078         static map<TexInfo, MIPMap<T> *> textures;
00079         TexInfo texInfo(filename, doTrilinear, maxAniso, wrap);
00080         if (textures.find(texInfo) != textures.end())
00081                 return textures[texInfo];
00082         static StatsCounter texLoaded("Texture", // NOBOOK
00083                 "Number of image maps loaded"); // NOBOOK
00084         ++texLoaded; // NOBOOK
00085         int width, height;
00086         Spectrum *texels = ReadImage(filename, &width, &height);
00087         MIPMap<T> *ret = NULL;
00088         if (texels) {
00089                 // Convert texels to type _T_ and create _MIPMap_
00090                 T *convertedTexels = new T[width*height];
00091                 for (int i = 0; i < width*height; ++i)
00092                         convert(texels[i], &convertedTexels[i]);
00093                 ret = new MIPMap<T>(width, height,
00094                                                         convertedTexels, doTrilinear,
00095                                                         maxAniso, wrap);
00096                 delete[] texels;
00097                 delete[] convertedTexels;
00098         }
00099         else {
00100                 // Create one-valued _MIPMap_
00101                 T *oneVal = new T[1];
00102                 oneVal[0] = 1.;
00103                 ret = new MIPMap<T>(1, 1, oneVal);
00104                 delete[] oneVal;
00105         }
00106         textures[texInfo] = ret;
00107         return ret;
00108 }
00109 template <class T>
00110 T ImageTexture<T>::Evaluate(
00111                 const DifferentialGeometry &dg) const {
00112         float s, t, dsdx, dtdx, dsdy, dtdy;
00113         mapping->Map(dg, &s, &t, &dsdx, &dtdx, &dsdy, &dtdy);
00114         return mipmap->Lookup(s, t, dsdx, dtdx, dsdy, dtdy);
00115 }
00116 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Texture<float> * CreateFloatTexture(const Transform &tex2world,
00117                 const TextureParams &tp) {
00118         // Initialize 2D texture mapping _map_ from _tp_
00119         TextureMapping2D *map = NULL;
00120         string type = tp.FindString("mapping");
00121         if (type == "" || type == "uv") {
00122                 float su = tp.FindFloat("uscale", 1.);
00123                 float sv = tp.FindFloat("vscale", 1.);
00124                 float du = tp.FindFloat("udelta", 0.);
00125                 float dv = tp.FindFloat("vdelta", 0.);
00126                 map = new UVMapping2D(su, sv, du, dv);
00127         }
00128         else if (type == "spherical") map = new SphericalMapping2D(tex2world.GetInverse());
00129         else if (type == "cylindrical") map = new CylindricalMapping2D(tex2world.GetInverse());
00130         else if (type == "planar")
00131                 map = new PlanarMapping2D(tp.FindVector("v1", Vector(1,0,0)),
00132                         tp.FindVector("v2", Vector(0,1,0)),
00133                         tp.FindFloat("udelta", 0.f), tp.FindFloat("vdelta", 0.f));
00134         else {
00135                 Error("2D texture mapping \"%s\" unknown", type.c_str());
00136                 map = new UVMapping2D;
00137         }
00138         // Initialize _ImageTexture_ parameters
00139         float maxAniso = tp.FindFloat("maxanisotropy", 8.f);
00140         bool trilerp = tp.FindBool("trilinear", false);
00141         string wrap = tp.FindString("wrap");
00142         ImageWrap wrapMode = TEXTURE_REPEAT;
00143         if (wrap == "" || wrap == "repeat") wrapMode = TEXTURE_REPEAT;
00144         else if (wrap == "black") wrapMode = TEXTURE_BLACK;
00145         else if (wrap == "clamp") wrapMode = TEXTURE_CLAMP;
00146         return new ImageTexture<float>(map, tp.FindString("filename"),
00147                 trilerp, maxAniso, wrapMode);
00148 }
00149 
00150 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Texture<Spectrum> * CreateSpectrumTexture(const Transform &tex2world,
00151                 const TextureParams &tp) {
00152         // Initialize 2D texture mapping _map_ from _tp_
00153         TextureMapping2D *map = NULL;
00154         string type = tp.FindString("mapping");
00155         if (type == "" || type == "uv") {
00156                 float su = tp.FindFloat("uscale", 1.);
00157                 float sv = tp.FindFloat("vscale", 1.);
00158                 float du = tp.FindFloat("udelta", 0.);
00159                 float dv = tp.FindFloat("vdelta", 0.);
00160                 map = new UVMapping2D(su, sv, du, dv);
00161         }
00162         else if (type == "spherical") map = new SphericalMapping2D(tex2world.GetInverse());
00163         else if (type == "cylindrical") map = new CylindricalMapping2D(tex2world.GetInverse());
00164         else if (type == "planar")
00165                 map = new PlanarMapping2D(tp.FindVector("v1", Vector(1,0,0)),
00166                         tp.FindVector("v2", Vector(0,1,0)),
00167                         tp.FindFloat("udelta", 0.f), tp.FindFloat("vdelta", 0.f));
00168         else {
00169                 Error("2D texture mapping \"%s\" unknown", type.c_str());
00170                 map = new UVMapping2D;
00171         }
00172         // Initialize _ImageTexture_ parameters
00173         float maxAniso = tp.FindFloat("maxanisotropy", 8.f);
00174         bool trilerp = tp.FindBool("trilinear", false);
00175         string wrap = tp.FindString("wrap");
00176         ImageWrap wrapMode = TEXTURE_REPEAT;
00177         if (wrap == "" || wrap == "repeat") wrapMode = TEXTURE_REPEAT;
00178         else if (wrap == "black") wrapMode = TEXTURE_BLACK;
00179         else if (wrap == "clamp") wrapMode = TEXTURE_CLAMP;
00180         return new ImageTexture<Spectrum>(map, tp.FindString("filename"),
00181                 trilerp, maxAniso, wrapMode);
00182 }
